name: art-velocity
description:
arttemplate转换成velocity语法 1.{{if admin}}

admin

{{else if code > 0}}

master

{{else}}

error!

{{/if}} => #if(admin) #elseif(code>0) #else #end 2.{{each list as value i}}{{/each}}=> #foreach(value in list) #set(i = #foreach.index) #end 注：art遍历 默认索引值{{$index}}，遍历的每一项值{{$value}} 3.{{name}}编码输出，转义html字符=> ${name} || $name {{#name}}不编码输出 4.{{include}}=> #include
author: wxx
